name: Head Ringer Team Flare Hyper Gear
effect:
The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to cost {C} more.
When this card is removed from a Pokémon for any reason, put this card in its owner’s discard pile.
author: 5ban Graphics
rule_box: Attach this Pokémon Tool to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon-EX that doesn’t already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it.
